project.title: Covid-19 Tracker
project.subtitle: SPA using React that tracks the spread of Covid-19
project.content: This project was built with the React framework and sources it's data from https://covid19.mathdro.id/api. The application makes use of the chart-js module to visualize the data. The project makes heavy use of flexbox in it's mobile-first responsive design.
